titles.title: A bill to extend through April 1, 2009, the MinnesotaCare Medicaid demonstration project.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/10/2008--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to extend through April 1, 2009, the approval of specified waivers under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act for the MinnesotaCare Medicaid demonstration project.
